heading: HB03716
0: AN ACT GRANTING THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES SPECIAL POWERS TO ADDRESS THE TRAFFIC AND CONGESTION CRISIS IN THE COUNTRY
short-title: Traffic And Congestion Crisis Act Of 2016
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-12-03, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-12-04 and received by the Senate on 2018-12-04 Substituted by HB06425
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03716
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES SPECIAL POWERS TO ADDRESS THE TRAFFIC AND CONGESTION CRISIS IN THE COUNTRY
SHORT TITLE : Traffic And Congestion Crisis Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Addresses the traffic and congestion crisis in the country which is now in the magnitude of a national emergency.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR. D.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-21
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 3, 38, 554, 1315, 1666, 3048, 3162, 3314, 3442, 3617, 3712, 3716, 4334, 4699 and HR No. 119 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB06425
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2016-09-26
